definition: shuanggui, an extralegal system within the CCP for detaining and interrogating cadres who fall from grace

sentences.english: A concept of bi-normalized response spectra was presented in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了雙規準反應譜的概念。

sentences.english: Song Siming was later supervised by the police due to his corruption and embezzlement and died due to car accident.
sentences.chinese: 而宋思明最後也因爲貪污等原因被雙規，翻車身亡。

sentences.english: We have a two-tier education system: private and public.
sentences.chinese: 我們實行的是雙規教育制度，公立制和私立制學校。
